revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Corrections from voting implemented, metadata revised.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Col.2, 3 no dot below iota, add accents/breathings to corrected reading, L.5 ancient diacritic instead of correction, L7-8 paragraphos, L.10 add ancient trema, L.11 add ancient correction, L.12 add accents/breathings to corrected reading, iota subscript, L.13 iota subscript, L.16 acute on Erin, add accents/breathings to corrected reading, L.17 ancient trema, L.18 ancient punctuation, no reg, L. 18 dot below gamma, L.19 reg erreipsen, twice iota subscript, L.20 add acute to Heras, Aphrodite written twice, add ancient correction, L. 22 iota subscript, add ancient correction Col. 3, L.28 underdot, :L.31-32 line end is supplement, L. 32-33 underdot, L.37 underdot, L.38 ancient punctuation, L.39-44 mark supplement from parallel, L.43-44 iota subscript
